title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: "Despite Saudi Arabia's rules prohibiting unmarried couples from living in, Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez will be permitted to do so". It is amazing what someone with such balls talent can do to a country. https://www.msn.com/en-us/sports/soccer/saudi-arabia-adjusts-its-marriage-laws-for-ronaldo-and-his-partner/ar-AA163TxK

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Saudi arabia is not a Muslim country, they just occupied that land, it's all a facade. So if you see these things don't be shocked.Btw, Islam doesn't say that you can't live on earth if you are unmarried, it says that to make it official, just say the words, you don't necessarily need to announce it to the world, though you'd need witnesses if ever there is a need to prove it to others, nowadays it's better if you register it somewhere official.If both parties are willing, they could just say the words before going under a roof together.But you know, when it comes to saudis, double standards are natural.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Jennifer Walters on January 10, 2023, 01:24:39 AM"Despite Saudi Arabia's rules prohibiting unmarried couples from living in, Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez will be permitted to do so". It is amazing what someone with such balls talent can do to a country. https://www.msn.com/en-us/sports/soccer/saudi-arabia-adjusts-its-marriage-laws-for-ronaldo-and-his-partner/ar-AA163TxKThat shows the influence Cristiano Ronaldo has in and off the pitch, Saudi Arabia takes things strictly bit for them to make that type of adjustment is something beyond reasoning.At the point Cristiano Ronaldo makes Saudi Arabia a point of focus for the footballing world and you can't just keep a stay like that from his family won't help him settle well in the country, Keeping a star like that includes the need of making him happy and with his family with him Cristiano Ronaldo will give you his best on the pitch.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: People of extreme wealth, power & utility always get rules & laws bent to help them. Ronaldo being there is huge for Saudi Arabia, it will bring them a lot of attention & interest. I saw something where the team he joined now has more instagram followers than a number of big European clubs which is crazy really.I also saw it being reported that Ronaldo will potentially help lead Saudi Arabia’s bid for the World Cup to be hosted there. Maybe that’s the real reason why he is being paid so much tp be there. The business opportunities & exposure that comes from hosting a World Cup are huge as Qatar is now finding.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: I would only be impressed if Ronaldo had a male for his bed partner.The fact he can consort with an unmarried woman and he is not married to another woman is fairly easy to be swept under the carpet.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: There must have been a great plan and thought prior to Al Nassr cutting £173m paycheck each year for Ronaldo playing for the football club. In all things it is Saudi Arabia, just goes to show they will change their beliefs in the name of sport and money. There must be other stipulations within his contract that probably will not be released to the public. Like things that Ronaldo cannot do in the while in Saudi Arabia. I really do not see any negative to this idea, Ronaldo is not above the law, he is a well renowned soccer player that wants to do what he does best. Saudi Arabia is giving him the opportunity to make the football team win alongside making sure that the deal was right with his paycheck.

comments.author: White pawn
comments.body: Well, was anyone expecting anything other than the rules being bent or interpreted differently to suit some certain influential people. Rules being bent for people happens all the time and the fact that it is happening now and again shows the desperation of the Saudis in having Ronaldo play for them at all costs. Knowing the spotlight and attention of having Ronaldo on their turf brings, they will bend and break more rules to have him stay and play football there.

comments.author: Qaisrani1
comments.body: That is not quite right .We are Muslims and we preach Islam. They are doing wrong because Islam is a complete code of life. We can not change our rules for someone . If they are living in relationship they have their own life .This has adverse effect on our lives .We have own disciplines and rules.
